mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum RN, comment_tbl.* FROM comment_tbl WHERE bbsSeq = #{bbsSeq} AND bbsUserId = #{bbsUserId} ORDER BY cmRegdate DESC) WHERE RN >= (SELECT max(rowNum) - (#{page} + 1) * #{commentPage} + 1 FROM comment_tbl) AND RN <= (SELECT max(rowNum) - #{page} * #{commentPage} FROM comment_tbl)
SELECT * FROM comment_tbl WHERE cmUserId = #{cmUserId} AND cmSeq = #{cmSeq}
mapper.update: UPDATE comment_tbl SET content = #{content} WHERE cmUserId = #{cmUserId} AND cmSeq = #{cmSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment_tbl (cmUserId, cmSeq, bbsSeq, cmContent, cmRegdate, bbsUserId) VALUES (#{cmUserId}, (SELECT NVL(max(cmSeq), 0) + 1 AS SEQ FROM comment_tbl WHERE cmUserId = #{cmUserId}) , #{bbsSeq}, #{cmContent}, sysdate, #{bbsUserId})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM comment_tbl WHERE cmUserId = #{cmUserId} AND cmSeq = #{cmSeq}
